review: now this is what should be presented in indian cinema, not half baked, cheesy plot consisting typical mellowdrama that is commonly shown. while the execution is if-fy for me, the idea of bringing the severity of corruption and injustice in india is brilliantly narrated on the big screen. i liked the acting by the cast however, there were certain things i did not like such as nuances that made a serious movie very comical and unbelievable; fighting sequences, sound effects (especially the punch which just sounds like a synthesizer kick) and then the fact that a politician knows how to fight, lol!! i would love to see a concept like this in a much newer, fresher script so that we rise above such political issues and help our nation develop and prosper.
